name: Ch18BBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Tana;Finally!|A moment of peace where we can all be together.
speak;Vanessa;It has been quite some time since the three of us could speak like this.|The war has kept us rather occupied.
speak;Syrene;Indeed.|I'm grateful for this brief respite from battle.|It's good to see both of you safe and well.
speak;Tana;Syrene!|I was so worried when I heard you were stationed near the Narube River.|We hadn't received word from you in so long!
speak;Syrene;My apologies, Princess Tana.|The enemy forces were preventing any messengers from getting through.
speak;Vanessa;Sister, we were all concerned.|But I knew if anyone could survive such an assignment, it would be you.
speak;Syrene;And look at you, Vanessa.|You've grown so much as a knight since we last flew together.
speak;Vanessa;I've only followed the example you set for me, Sister.
speak;Tana;You're both amazing!|The pride of Frelia's pegasus knights!|I only hope to be as skilled as you both someday.
speak;Syrene;Princess, you sell yourself short.|Your skills have improved tremendously.|King Hayden would be proud of your progress.
speak;Vanessa;It's true.|You've proven yourself on the battlefield many times over.
speak;Tana;Thank you, both of you.|I've had excellent teachers in you two.
speak;Tana;Speaking of Frelia...|Do you miss home as much as I do?
speak;Syrene;Every day.|The clear blue skies over Castle Frelia...|There's nothing quite like it.
speak;Vanessa;And the mountain ranges where we train.|I find myself dreaming of those peaks.
speak;Tana;The spring festival in the capital city...|The summer flowers in the royal gardens...|I can't wait to see it all again.
speak;Tana;But first, we must see this war through to the end.|Together.
speak;Vanessa;The three knights of Frelia, fighting as one.
speak;Tana;Oh!|That reminds me...|I have something for both of you.
speak;Vanessa;I wonder what the princess has prepared.
speak;Syrene;She's always been thoughtful, even as a child.
speak;Tana;Here they are!|One for each of us.
speak;Tana;They're trinkets of Fale, the wind god of Frelia.|I had them made before we left the castle.
speak;Tana;I've been saving them for when we could all be together again.
speak;Syrene;These are exquisite, Princess.|The craftsmanship is remarkable.
speak;Vanessa;A wind god for pegasus knights...|How fitting.
speak;Tana;Legend says that Fale watches over those who soar through his domain.|That he guides the winds to carry pegasi safely home.
speak;Tana;I thought...|I hoped these might protect us.|So that we never have to be separated again.
speak;Syrene;It's a wonderful gift, Princess Tana.|I shall treasure it always.
speak;Tana;Please, both of you, just call me Tana.|We're friends first, before princess and knights.
speak;Tana;Let's make a promise.|With these trinkets as our bond.|That we'll protect each other and return to Frelia together.
speak;Tana;No matter what happens in this war...|We three will fly home as one.
speak;Tana;Then it's settled!|May Fale's winds guide our wings and keep us safe!
